channel.title: Exchango FX - Global Currency Converter
channel.description: Exchango FX - Real-time exchange rates and currency converter app supporting 150+ currencies worldwide.

item.title: About Exchango FX
item.description: Discover Exchango FX app features: real-time exchange rates, currency conversion, multi-currency support, tip calculator, and more.

item.title: Exchango FX 소개
item.description: Exchango FX 앱의 주요 기능을 소개합니다. 실시간 환율 조회, 환전 계산, 다중 통화 지원, 팁 계산기 등 다양한 기능을 제공합니다.

item.title: Exchango FXについて
item.description: Exchango FXアプリの主な機能をご紹介します。リアルタイム為替レート、通貨換算、複数通貨対応、チップ計算機など。

item.title: 关于 Exchango FX
item.description: 了解Exchango FX应用功能：实时汇率查询、货币兑换、多币种支持、小费计算器等。

item.title: Über Exchango FX
item.description: Entdecken Sie die Funktionen der Exchango FX App: Echtzeit-Wechselkurse, Währungsumrechnung, Multi-Währungs-Unterstützung und mehr.

item.title: Acerca de Exchango FX
item.description: Descubre las funciones de Exchango FX: tipos de cambio en tiempo real, conversión de divisas, soporte multi-moneda y más.

item.title: À propos d'Exchango FX
item.description: Découvrez les fonctionnalités d'Exchango FX: taux de change en temps réel, conversion de devises, support multi-devises et plus.

item.title: Informazioni su Exchango FX
item.description: Scopri le funzionalità dell'app Exchango FX: tassi di cambio in tempo reale, conversione valuta, supporto multi-valuta e altro.

item.title: Sobre o Exchango FX
item.description: Conheça os recursos do Exchango FX: taxas de câmbio em tempo real, conversão de moedas, suporte a múltiplas moedas e mais.

item.title: О приложении Exchango FX
item.description: Узнайте о функциях Exchango FX: курсы валют в реальном времени, конвертация валют, поддержка множества валют и многое другое.

item.title: Exchango FX Hakkında
item.description: Exchango FX uygulama özelliklerini keşfedin: gerçek zamanlı döviz kurları, para birimi dönüştürme, çoklu para birimi desteği ve daha fazlası.

item.title: เกี่ยวกับ Exchango FX
item.description: ค้นพบฟีเจอร์ของแอป Exchango FX: อัตราแลกเปลี่ยนแบบเรียลไทม์ แปลงสกุลเงิน รองรับหลายสกุลเงิน และอื่นๆ

item.title: Exchango FX के बारे में
item.description: Exchango FX ऐप की विशेषताएं जानें: रीयल-टाइम विनिमय दरें, मुद्रा रूपांतरण, बहु-मुद्रा समर्थन और बहुत कुछ।

item.title: حول Exchango FX
item.description: اكتشف ميزات تطبيق Exchango FX: أسعار الصرف في الوقت الفعلي، تحويل العملات، دعم العملات المتعددة والمزيد.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Exchango FX Privacy Policy. Learn about our data collection, usage, and protection practices.

item.title: 개인정보처리방침
item.description: Exchango FX 앱의 개인정보처리방침입니다. 사용자 데이터 수집, 이용, 보호에 관한 정책을 안내합니다.
